basic.name: Rock-It! Turret (Q)
basic.description: Create a turret that deals 36 damage. Lasts for 15 seconds.Turrets prioritize the nearest enemy Hero when first created.

basic.name: Deth Lazor (W)
basic.description: After 0.65 seconds, deal 175 damage to enemies in a line. Heal for 25% of the damage dealt, increased to 75% against enemy Heroes.

basic.name: Xplodium Charge (E)
basic.description: Place a bomb that deals 142 damage to enemies within the target area after 1.25 seconds.  Enemies hit are also Stunned for 1 second.

heroic.name: Robo-Goblin (R)
heroic.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds. Passive: Basic Attacks deal 90 bonus damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

heroic.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000 (R)
heroic.description: After a 1.5 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 220 damage. Basic Abilities deal 30% more damage for 5 seconds after casting Grav-O-Bomb 3000.

trait.name: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle (T)
trait.description: Regenerate 1 Scrap every 4 seconds. Destroyed Rock-It! Turrets drop 1 Scrap, which can be picked up.Activate to destroy a target Rock-It! Turret.

1.name: Rocket Boots
1.description: Increase the cast range of Xplodium Charge by 30% and its damage by 35%. Hitting an enemy Hero increases Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

1.name: Big Game Hunter
1.description: Increase maximum Scrap by 2. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes, Mercenaries, or Monsters accelerates Reduce, Reuse, Recycle Scrap regeneration by 1.5 seconds.

1.name: One Man Wrecking Crew
1.description: Casting Basic Abilities cause Gazlowe's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal 60% more damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Rock It Sock It
4.description: Casting Rock-It! Turret grants Gazlowe a Shield that absorbs up to 200 damage for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Hyperfocus Coils
4.description: Heroes hit by Deth Lazor or Xplodium Charge take an additional 2% of their maximum Health in damage. Gazlowe is healed for 150% of the damage dealt.

4.name: EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
4.description: Activate to gain 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%, and reduce damage dealt by all nearby enemy Heroes and Summons by 50% for 3 seconds

7.name: Goblin Fusion
7.description: Generate 3 Scrap for each Hero hit by Deth Lazor.

7.name: Overload
7.description: Deth Lazor can now store up to 2 charges. Each enemy Hero hit by Deth Lazor reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Master Blaster
7.description: Deth Lazor and Xplodium Charge Slow enemies hit by 35% for 3 seconds. Rock-It! Turret Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed in this way extend the Slow duration by 0.5 seconds.

10.name: Robo-Goblin
10.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds. Passive: Basic Attacks deal 90 bonus damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

10.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 220 damage. Basic Abilities deal 30% more damage for 5 seconds after casting Grav-O-Bomb 3000.

13.name: Positive Reinforcement
13.description: Primary Rock-It! Turret attacks against Heroes increase Gazlowe's Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Superior Schematics
13.description: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additional enemies for 100% damage and have 30% increased Basic Attack range.

13.name: Overcharged Capacitors
13.description: Gazlowe gains 5% Spell Power for each active Rock-It! Turret, up to a maximum of 15%. Dealing Basic Attack damage extends the duration of Rock-It! Turrets by 1.25 seconds.

16.name: Firin' Mah Lazorz
16.description: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 125 damage.

16.name: Ark Reaktor
16.description: Reduce the cooldown of Xplodium Charge by 2 seconds. Casting Xplodium Charge creates 3 miniature Rock-It! Turrets that last for 3 seconds.These Turrets do not drop Scrap or benefit from other Talents.

16.name: Overklock
16.description: Basic Attacks grant Gazlowe 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.Dealing Basic Attack damage to Heroes causes them to take an additional 2.5% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: Mecha-Lord
20.description: Basic Attacks increase Gazlowe's Armor by 10 for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 30, and deal 50% bonus damage to Stunned or Slowed enemies.

20.name: Miniature Black Hole
20.description: Increase Grav-O-Bomb 3000's radius by 25% and its damage by 50%. Each enemy Hero pulled reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

20.name: It's Raining Scrap
20.description: Reduce the Scrap cost of Rock-It! Turrets by 1. Regain 2 Scrap for each Scrap pickup.

20.name: Bomb Toss
20.description: Xplodium Charge gains a 2nd charge with a 3 second cooldown between uses and launches 2 more bombs when it detonates.
